about_the_game:
Add to Wishlist to warm our hearts!

Endure the cruelty of an oppresive regime and those who would safeguard its interests, all the while fighting to stay human in an uncaring, cruel world. There are many more like you, and your brothers in misfortune need you - will you find it in yourself to lend them a hand?



Stay and suffer or take the risk and flee, the choice is yours. Make sure to live through the consequences of your actions, though - your lifespan in the frostlands will be measured in things you can steal and things you can carry, not to mention raw physical skill. Even then, bare hands fare poorly against bear hands...



Remember: your enemy is legion, and they are relentless in their hunt. They will never cease, they will chase you down, and they will kill you. After all, you are the only soul capable of telling the world about the atrocities that have taken place in this frozen hell.



Key Features:
  • Unique 'thoughts and madness' system
  • Escape, chase and survival parts
  • Struggle with nature, frost and hunger
  • Generated, modular map
  • WIde selection of characters to play - teachers, politicians, soldiers, artists with various skills.
  • Freedom

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains depictions of realistic-looking violence.
